artist: Engraver: Francesco Rosaspina; Engraver: Guilio Tomba; Artist: After Ludovico Carracci
description: Christ being beaten by two men one holding him by hair; man in foreground reclining; man right background observing; man with rope tied around pillar and around hand of Jesus; one other man at left
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

In plate in black: [ Lud. Carracci dip.;  F. Rosaspina dis.   G. Tomba LA FLAGELLAZIONE DI GESU CRISTO]
title: La Flagellazione Di Gesù Cristo
